Legacy Document

Inside Macintosh: Cyberdog Programmer's Kit / Part 3 - Cyberdog Reference
Chapter 7 - Classes and Methods / CyberFormExtension

SetBody

Sets the data to be included in a form request.

void SetBody (in char* body);
body
A pointer to a buffer that contains the data.
DISCUSSION
This method sets the data that should be included in the form request. For HTML forms, this data is the information the user specified in the form.

If you subclass CyberFormExtension, you must override this method. Your override must not call its inherited method; that is, your override method must implement this method's functionality completely.

SEE ALSO
The SetContentType method (page 224).
The SetMethod method (page 225).
